snippet: The company’s patents for its Nespresso coffee machine system do not prevent consumers from using other capsules, a regional court in Germany said.
abstract: German court rules against Nestle in its attempt to stop companies from selling generic coffee capsules compatible with Nespresso machines in Germany; says its patents do not prevent consumers from using other capsules.
lead_paragraph: The company’s patents for its Nespresso coffee machine system do not prevent consumers from using other capsules, a regional court in Germany said.

headline.seo: Nestlé Loses Bid to Prevent Sales of Rival Coffee Capsules
headline.main: Nestlé Loses Bid to Block Rival Coffee Capsules
headline.print_headline: Nestlé Loses Bid to Block Rival Coffee Capsules
